#id=1
#text=My five year old son loves to read books , so today we both decided to head towards the library to pick one out .
#id=2
#text=Before leaving the house I made sure he had his library card with him because without it he would n't be able to borrow a book .
#id=3
#text=When we entered the library we went straight towards the kid section .
#id=4
#text=There were thousands of books to choose from and he had a little trouble making up his mind .
#id=5
#text=Finally we found a book about the different type of sea animals in the ocean .
#id=6
#text=He was very excited as he flipped through the pages of the book .
#id=7
#text=When he decided this was the book he wanted to take home , we make our way towards the librarian .
#id=8
#text=She greeted us with a friendly hello and asked my son for his library card .
#id=9
#text=She scanned the card and book then handed them both back to my son .
#text=She informed us when the book was due back and we both thanked her and wished her a pleasant day .
